line_1: Or shall I hie to mine own hermitage,
line_2: There may I lonely turn the sacred page,

line_1: Together now they seek the hermitage
line_2: Where in his dortour wons the hoary sage.

line_1: Mine house shall prove an hermitage.
line_2: Right well I ween that in this age,

line_1: His banquet marr'd, grown dull his hermitage.
line_2: His fairy revels are exchang'd for rage,
